inscription: Printed letterpress inscription, LL: This is an original ink wash by Gilbert & George, specially created to accompany number 138 [number is hand-inscribed in red pencil on a blank underscore] of the de luxe edition of The World of Gilbert & George: The Storyboard (Enitharmon Press, 2001)
life_date: British, born  Italy 1943 & British, born 1942, resp.
medium: Black ink and wash on paper
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Untitled
